item.title: Hello World - Our First Post
item.description:
Welcome to Techmen.ai!

This is our first blog post, created to demonstrate how easy it is to manage content with PageCMS.

How This Works

  1. Write content in Markdown
  2. Edit via PageCMS interface
  3. Push to GitHub
  4. Cloudflare Pages auto-deploys

Simple as fuck. ðŸš€
